nio/WebHandler.description: Launches an HTTP server on the specified port and notifies signals when requests are made to that server.

nio/WebJSONHandler.description: Handle incoming HTTP requests that contain a JSON body

nio/WebJSONOutput.description: Respond to incoming HTTP requests made with the WebJSONHandler block with a JSON body response.

nio/WebOutput.description: This block writes to the response for a given HTTP request made to a WebHandler block
